title: Followers in congregation are not facing qiblah exactly as imam, who should I follow Assim al hakeem
transcript: says the imam is faced this direction the the moons the followers are a little bit tilted who should i follow it doesn't matter this little deviation from the qibla is permissible and exempted in islam if you know that the congregation are praying to the right direction exactly by the degree then follow them if not it's okay to pray either way
